entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
